target: i hire multiple baby sitters to take care of my kids , i am a single dad .
context: <user> 10 hey , how are you doing today <system> i am kind of sad because my ex dumped me for a lawyer , you ? <user> 11 i am sorry to hear that . i prefer open relationships so i can be free ! <system> that is awesome that means you are very open minded . <user> 12 i try to be ! do you like sports ? <system> nope , i prefer to stay inside , i am a recording engineer and own my own studio . <user> 13 that is unique . i love the olympics . i walk dogs to make money . <system> awesome , how old are you ?<user> 14 i am 25 . how old are you ? <system> i am 46 yrs old i live in california and i have 46 kids .<user> 15 46 kids ? how do you handle that ? i do door to door sales with my dad . <system>
